title: 87/132/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 January 1987 approving the special programmes drawn up by a number of Italian regions for the replanting and conversion of olive groves damaged by frost in 1985 under Council Regulation (EEC) No 1654/86 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 January 1987
approving the special programmes drawn up by a number of Italian regions for the replanting and conversion of olive groves damaged by frost in 1985 under Council Regulation (EEC) No 1654/86
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(87/132/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The special programmes for the replanting and conversion of olive groves damaged by frost in 1985 drawn up by the Regions of Tuscany, Lazio, Umbria and Liguria sent by the Italian Government on 12 September and 8 October 1986 and subsequently amended and supplemented are hereby approved under Regulation (EEC) No 1654/86.

The Italian Government shall report annually to the Commission on implementation of the programmes in the regions concerned, by means of summary tables, taking the form shown in the Annex, quantifying the operations already carried out, in progress and anticipated.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 January 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
